name: DHCP Server Data Subnet

var.desc: Descriptive name for the DHCP scope.
Network address for the DHCP IPv4 scope.
Subnet mask of the network address for the DHCP IPv4 scope.
Default gateway for the DHCP IPv4 scope.
Primary DNS server for the DHCP scope.
Secondary DNS server for the DHCP scope.
Domain name for the DHCP scope.
DHCP lease time in days for the scope.

desc: Cisco devices can act as DHCP Servers. This example shows how to configure DHCP and some standard parameters for a Data subnet in a scope.!!! Usage: clean
